div.span: Superintendent Farley, Marion County Board of Education Members and the Central Office Staff are proud of our employees, students, parents and community for staying on track to support one another!

h2.font: Note to Parents about Student Health Requirements:

div.div:
Parents, a new policy instituted in 2018 now requires that, all students entering Pre-K and Kindergarten for the 2019-2020 school year and any student entering the second, seventh, or twelfth grade are required to show proof of a dental examination and a health examination prior to entry into school on August 21st. In addition, students in the seventh and twelfth grade are also required to have the Tdap and Meningitis shots prior to entering school.
Please make an appointment with your child's doctor and dentist to ensure that your student has completed the necessary examinations and requirements. Documentation must be provided to your child's school prior to the start of school.
For more information and a copy of the required examination form please contact your school or visit the Health Requirements and Resources page to read more and download forms.
Posted: July 16, 2019

a.span: Required Dental and Health Exam Form
